linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.

name: Battlevoid: Sector Siege OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/7/Vista
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.

short_description: The official soundtrack for Battlevoid: Sector Siege. Excellent atmospheric music by Lombus.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
